long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
THE CHROME PLUGIN THAT TURNS MAJOR NEWS SITES INTO REPLICAS OF FOX NEWS. 

THE CHROME PLUGIN THAT TURNS MAJOR NEWS SITES INTO REPLICAS OF FOX NEWS. TRICK YOUR CONSERVATIVE FAMILY INTO READING REAL NEWS! REAL REPUTABLE SOURCES WILL DISPLAY IN THE COMFORTING GUISE OF AMERICAN CONSERVATIVES' FAVORITE OUTLET.


FOXY TIP: RIGHT AFTER INSTALLING, "UNPIN" THE EXTENSION FROM CHROME SO NO ONE WILL KNOW :) 

Detailed Description:

STEP 1 → INSTALL ON THE FAMILY COMPUTER
STEP 2 → SEND YOUR FAMILY LINKS TO REAL NEWS 
STEP 3 → FAMILY BELIEVES REAL NEWS! 

Please note:

This plugin is not intended for use on your own computer! Why would you want to do that to yourself? This plugin works specifically on 80 of the most prominent center and left leaning news websites.


Part of MSCHF Mag Volume 6: Eat More Meat, Watch More Fox, Stop Printing the Bible, Stick Your Hands in Your Mouth.
